login.title: Login
login.notVerifiedInfo: You account seems to be not verified. If you did not get an email, you can resend the verification email to verify your account.

createAccount.title: Create Account
createAccount.info: Your account was created! After you verified your account in the email we sent you, you can log into your account.
createAccount.emailInfo: If you did not get an email, you can resend the verification email to verify your account.
createAccount.terms: I consent to the processing and storage of my personal data provided above for the use of ZWOO. More info at:
createAccount.nameInfo: Your username is visible to other players in the game. Therefore, it is best to choose a fictitious name.

landing.login: Log In To An Existing Account

errors.usernameToShort: Username should be at least 4 Characters long.
errors.passwordNotLongEnough: Password should be at least 8 Characters long.
errors.shouldContainNumber: Password should contain at least one number.
errors.shouldContainNormalChar: Password should contain at least one letter character.
errors.shouldContainSpecialChar: Password should contain at least one special character.
errors.gameNameToShort: Name should be at least 3 Characters long.
errors.fillIn: Please fill in all required fields.

backend.100: An error occurred in the backend.
backend.112: The user could not be found.
backend.119: The Consent to data processing is required.
backend.122: The account could not be verified.
backend.135: The user could not be deleted.
backend.140: The game could not be found.
backend.141: The name of the game is missing.
backend.142: You could not join the game.
backend.143: The opcode is missing (this is an internal error).
backend.144: The opcode is invalid (this is an internal error).
backend.146: You are already in a game.

zrp.425: Bot with this name already exists

wait.qrcodeInfo: Other Player an join the game directly with the QRCode.

sharesheet.title: Share your game!
sharesheet.info: Share a link to join your game with your friends.

wait.noWinsOnlineInfo: A minimum of 2 players ist needed for the wins to count onto the leaderboard. Bots do not count as players.
wait.noWinsOfflineInfo: Wins of offline games do not count in the leaderboard.

maxPlayers.title: Amount of Players
maxPlayers.info: Change maximum amount of players for your game.

addUpDraw.title: Add draw amounts
addUpDraw.info: On top of a draw card, further draw cards can be placed. The number of cards to be drawn is added. You can put +2 cards on top of +4 cards, as well as +4 cards on top of +2 cards.

initialCards.title: Amount Of Cards
initialCards.info: Choose the amount of cards each player is supplied with at the start of a game..

reassure.title: Delete Account
reassure.body: Once the account is deleted, the action cannot be undone.
reassure.accept: Yes, I want to delete my account.

cookies.title: Cookie Consent
cookies.userInformation: Since the privacy of our players is very important to us, we completely dispense with tracking cookies and instead use only technically necessary cookies.

auth.name: Authentication Cookies (Strictly necessary)
auth.description: We use cookies to store your login across multiple browser sessions, so that you don't have to re-enter your credentials every time you visit.

disallowed.title: Missing Cookies
disallowed.info: Login- and account-creation functionality needs Google reCAPTCHA cookies enabled. Please change your settings and try again.

join.title: Join {0}!
join.text: You got invited into a zwoo game, use the link to join now!

promotePlayer.title: Promote {0} to a host?
promotePlayer.body: Are you sure that you want to promote {0}? You will lose your host status.

kickPlayer.title: Kick {0}?
kickPlayer.body: Are you sure, that you want to kick {0}?

selectColor.title: Choose a color
selectColor.info: Choose the color, that should be played with from now on.

wrongVersion.title: Wrong Version
wrongVersion.info: You need to upgrade zwoo to the latest version in order to play games. (Client: {0}, Server: {1})

verifyAccount.title: Account-Verification
verifyAccount.success: Your account has been successfully verified.
verifyAccount.error: An error happened while verifying you account.

requestPasswordReset.title: Password forgotten
requestPasswordReset.info: An email will be sent to the specified email address with a link to reset the password.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.info: The password has been successfully reset, you can log in now.

popoutChat.noActiveGame: There are no active games at the moment.

versionHistory.title: Version history
versionHistory.failure: The version history could not be loaded.
